title: 关于结婚插件Marriage-Reloaded的变量
author: Gdmfz
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Gdmfz 于 2020-2-21 13:23 编辑 

我想问一下，就是加了Marriage-reloaded插件后，使用变量%marriage_is_married%(查看玩家是否单身)我把变量加载miaochat里，重载后聊天变成NO，能不能想个办法让他变成[单身]或者[未婚]和[已婚]这样？我谢谢大家了。

replies.author: 弥猫うた
replies.txt_content:
确保PAPI下载了javascript变量后
sex:
  expression: '"%marriage_is_married%" == "NO"'
  type: boolean
  true_result: '&b单身狗'
  false_result: '&e已婚'

replies.author: Gdmfz
replies.txt_content:
Mucrazy 发表于 2020-2-21 12:10
确保PAPI下载了javascript变量后
sex:
  expression: '"%marriage_is_married%" == "NO"'
那个配置文件？

replies.author: 弥猫うた
replies.txt_content:
Gdmfz 发表于 2020-2-21 12:12
那个配置文件？
javascript_placeholders.yml

replies.author: Gdmfz
replies.txt_content:
Mucrazy 发表于 2020-2-21 12:13
javascript_placeholders.yml
example:
  file: example.js
  engine: nashorn
sex:
  expression: '"%marriage_is_married%" == "NO"'
  type: boolean
  true_result: '&b单身狗'
  false_result: '&e已婚'

我写进去了，不行。

replies.author: 弥猫うた
replies.txt_content:
Gdmfz 发表于 2020-2-21 12:17
example:
  file: example.js
  engine: nashorn
把boolean改成string试试

replies.author: Gdmfz
replies.txt_content:
Mucrazy 发表于 2020-2-21 12:22
把boolean改成string试试
还是不行怎么办啊
